name: FreeTex
summary: 一个免费的公式智能识别软件
summaryEn: A free intelligent formula recognition software
description: 一个免费的公式智能识别软件，它可以识别图像中的数学公式并将其转换为可编辑的Word或Latex格式。
descriptionEn: A free intelligent formula recognition software that can recognize mathematical formulas in images and convert them into editable Word or Latex formats.

name: FreePDF
summary: 一个免费的PDF文献阅读器
summaryEn: A free PDF reader that supports translating PDF
description: 一个免费的PDF文献阅读器，支持将各语言的PDF文献转成中文，并支持接入大模型基于文献内容进行问答。
descriptionEn: A free PDF document reader that supports converting PDF documents in various languages ​​into Chinese, and supports access to large models for question and answer based on document content.

name: FreeEditor
summary: 一个免费的双栏型markdown编辑器
description: 一款简洁的双栏 Markdown 编辑器，支持实时预览和微信公众号样式导出。
descriptionEn: A clean dual-pane Markdown editor with real-time preview and WeChat Official Account style export.

name: FreeGIF
summary: 一个免费的GIF屏幕录制和编辑工具
summaryEn: A free GIF screen recording and editing tool
description: 一个免费的GIF屏幕录制和编辑工具。
descriptionEn: A free GIF screen recording and editing tool.

name: ragflow-plus
summary: 一个基于Ragflow的二次开发的RAG应用框架
summaryEn: A RAG application framework based on Ragflow secondary development
description: 一个基于Ragflow的二次开发的RAG应用框架。
descriptionEn: A RAG application framework based on Ragflow secondary development.

name: 拼字幕
summary: 微信小程序：拼字幕-长图拼接助手
summaryEn: WeChat Mini Program: Subtitle Splicing - Long Image Splicing Assistant
description: 微信小程序：拼字幕-长图拼接助手，用于制作长图字幕拼接。
descriptionEn: WeChat applet: Splice subtitles - long image stitching assistant, used to create long image subtitle stitching.

name: FreeCut
description: 一个PowerPoint插件，支持页面自动裁剪并导出为PDF文件。
descriptionEn: a PowerPoint plug-in that supports automatic cropping and exporting to PDF files.

name: FreeP2W
summary: 一个将 PDF 转换成 Word 的CLI工具
summaryEn: A CLI tool to convert PDF to Word
description: 一个将 PDF 转换成 Word 的CLI工具，在 pdf2docx 的基础上，优化了图片和数学公式表现。
descriptionEn: A CLI tool for converting PDF to Word, based on pdf2docx, with optimized image and math formula performance.
